Review Title: "Worst Company for your career. Firing can be anytime."
Employee Years at Company: I worked at Practo Technologies
Pros Text: Good incentive structure but that also compromised as the company want to go for profitability.
Cons Text:
1. Hr policy is good for nothing they are not employee friendly. When you call HR she is always busy in meetings no call back. 

2. Company is now looking to fire experienced employee & wants to hire engg freshers at lower cost for which they set unrealistic target & lower the increment & incentive for which the people actually works for Practo.

3. Lots of politics, they do promote you bcoz of your previous achievements but they don’t change the scale instead they said company don’t have that Budget which clearly states they don’t want to retain old employees.

4. Create lots of pressure to achieve your target.

5. Freshers if you seriously wants to have a good career don’t join this organisation, they cab fire you at anytime. For better clarity atleast have word with the current employee.
Advice to Management: Trust your employee who gave you so many years and build a brand Practo.

Employee Years at Company: I have been working at Hilton full-time for less than a year
Pros Text:
Brand name Hilton.
Part of a Global company.
Cons Text:
Hilton has not been successful in India, owing to the teams who run it, right from country heads.
Novice Management, scared to take decisions. 
Support from top management is weak. 
Poor maintenance of working equipments.
Low inventory numbers.
Advice to Management:
Work on your high attrition rates.
Department heads stop faking and get into th grooves of operations. 
Start listening, its important operations head does it. 
End of the month, look at long working hours of each individual. 
Ensure everyone gets their assigned of days, thse are not only made for management. Look at EoM. HR should pay genuine and close attention.

Employee Years at Company: I have been working at Hilton full-time
Pros Text:
Great Benefits.
Mediocre compensation.
Invests in developing and engaging the talent pool.
The Company in general is brilliant for the lower strata of employees but very turbulent way up.
Cons Text:
Extremely Turbulent in terms of senior leadership for India and the individual hotel leadership teams.
The company has worldwide presence but inter country transfers are extremely rare.
The Company in general is brilliant for the lower strata of employees but very turbulent way up.
Advice to Management: Need to stabilize the company in India, way too many changes in senior leadership across the units and also at the regional corporate structure.

Review Title: "If you care for your career, don't join this company. An honest opinion"
Employee Years at Company: I worked at Hilton full-time
Pros Text: Don't join Hilton India. If you care for your career. There are numerous companies that you can go for
Cons Text: I worked at a place where I was literally harassed by a female hod. Not only me, the whole team then. She was the lowest rated hod of all time. During this feedback time I never even said anything about her. But everyone knew she was crazy everyone I meet tells me she is a horrible person to work with and yet she is in a leading position now. The people who are hired in Hilton north india side have no basic humanity in them.
Advice to Management: I would advise you to take a closer look at how people have been operating since it's and up coming brand in India and you want honest people working for you. Not people who torture kids.

Employee Years at Company: I worked at Hilton full-time

Cons Text: If not working for a corporate owned or managed property, you will be subject to owners that may not invest in the property in a way that would help the guest and employee experience.

Employee Years at Company: I worked at Hilton
Pros Text:
The interview was good it was a smooth process ,first was the campus round where I got selected it was just an extempore then the second round was at hotel it was about group discussion, personal interview. Then there is an SHL TEST (logical reasoning)
That's it the HR and department heads were really humble
Cons Text: I didn't got a call back after SHL round and there was no mail or any contact from them about the results
